node.title: Iqbal Demystified – Android App
node.content:
Description:

 

Iqbal Demystified App helps the young generation to fully understand the work of Allama Iqbal.
The purpose of this app is to facilitate
students who are unable to benefit from Iqbal’s work because of the difficult terms used or the lack of knowledge about the context of the poems.

 

Brought to you by:

 

Azeem Zaheer

International Iqbal Society
Online Resource Development Team
www.iqbal.com.pk

 

Features:

•No Ads!
•Verse-by-verse English Translation
•Introduction (main theme) of Poems
•Explanation of difficult terms
•Search Capability!
•Audio of Poems available to download within the app (all free)
•Bookmark your favorite poems
•Editor’s Pick: List of most famous poems to get you started!
•Share poems and verses using Facebook, Email and SMS
•Choose between the Beautiful Nastaleeq Font and Asunaskh Font

Books Included: (Complete Urdu Collection)

1 – Bang-e-Dra (بانگ درا)
2 – Bal-e-Jibreel (بال جبريل)
3 – Zarb-e-Kaleem (ضرب كليم)
4 – Armaghan-e-Hijaz (ارمغان حجاز)

Visit us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Iqbal-Demystified/671684026235997
